name: James G
text: 5/2019 Fresh and delicious as usual. Tried the Bbq sause with chicken and bacon. They use a little sause and put more on the side. Was perfect because the sause is strong and delicious, so ur able to pick how much u need. Wings are are ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Werlinger
text: This is one of the best Pizza Huts I‚Äôve eaten at. They‚Äôre always consistent with the quality of their pizzas which is something you can‚Äôt always count on.

name: Kris W
text: I rate restaurants based on their categories,. Ie. A pizza place different than fine dining!  My son and I love to break up our travels with a stop at pizza hut! So we've been to a lot over the years!   This one is by far, probably the best ‚Ä¶More

name: Beverly Epps
text: First let me say this. I love Pizza Hut and this establishment just stole my taste buds put them away just to be rediscovered the next time. The pizza is by far the tastiest I have ever eaten. All of their workers are very nice helpful people who aim to please.

name: jean w
text: Last minute discussion to go. Took the littles and they had a blast! Parking sucied, but that might be because it was Halloween event going on.

name: Jason Kraus
text: There was a new person at the register, but she handled her position well with only a few minor hiccups. And the manager was helpful with her own and customer questions. Food took a while, but worth the wait. The crust was golden brown and NOT burnt or too crispy. My wife and daughter enjoyed their pizzas. Thanks

name: Vicki Oden
text: This location, in particular, makes THE BEST PIZZAS EVER!!! The very BEST of "The Hut"!

name: BJS
text: Pizza is good. Your standard quick pizza place. And service is usually good but not recently. Ordered carryout online. Went in and paid for my order. Lady at counter then continues to help someone instead of taking 2 seconds to see if my ‚Ä¶More

name: Melanie Mendoza
text: Pizza, yeah, super good. A favorite evening place of mine. Looking forward to a return trip. Feels like a cafe in Phoenix that I enjoyed visiting.

name: Tricia Lynch
text: I hate that you don't talk to someone actually in the local restaurant when you call in an order.  I miss the hometown feel.   I also hate not having a salad bar where I can choose and create my own salad.

name: Kristopher Willis
text: Better than your average Pizza Hut pizza but took forever to get our pizza that we called in ahead of time. Our "15 minute" wait was more of a 30 minute wait after getting there 10 minutes after calling it in. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jesse Almaguer
text: It's a very nice place that would seem like a blast to visit if you wanna watch a game with some buddies. The staff is very friendly and very fast. I ordered online and 3 minutes late my order was done. Wow!

name: Beth Caballero
text: Love the cookies and brownies.  Check your order before you leave.

name: Bunni Reed
text: I love Pizza Hut! Here in Huntsville, Tx we only have a pickup or deliverly. Not a place to dine in, but the pizza is still good!!

name: Lisa Hall
text: It was ok. Funky smelling due to sharing the same ventilation as the nail salon next door. I ordered a Ultimate cheese lover with the creamy parmesan sauce with parmesan crust. Well the pizza came out with the normal tomatoes sauce and the crust was really dry and lacked taste for the price it was disappointing.

name: Brandi Barrett
text: Great pizza fast workers

name: Patricia Ingram
text: Waited 45 mins for my pizza... Very disappointed...

name: Toni Moore
text: The Pizza Hut on Sam Houston Avenue has improved, and I appreciate all of their hard work. Grace, peace and blessing to all of the employees at both Pizza Hut's in Huntsville, TX.

name: Nina Payne
text: Was very good pizza and chicken wings

name: Honeypot Juice box
text: I went this afternoon. I had never had 2 males behave so rude and unprofessional. Very unacceptable behavior. I hope I never go when they are there. Hwy 30 pizza hut was horrible customer service.

name: Glenda Crooks
text: Customer service was great and the food was excellent.

name: Stasia Lynn
text: Long wait the bread is sweet...

name: Wilburn Runnels
text: Good food and friendly service

name: Jack Merritt Sr
text: The wings taste like chilli lime and I didn't order chilli lime.

name: M.A.C. cheez
text: Did they completely forgot about my order and then pretended like if it was going to take forever. There were people that were behind me that got out of there significantly faster. This is the third time that it happens at this location. If you're going to go to a Pizza Hut in Huntsville go to the one on Sam Houston Avenue.

name: Gabe H
text: Great pizza, probably the best in Huntsville, but little Caesars will beat the price to quality

name: Mark Cruse
text: Very good, but pricey!!!!

name: Boyce Anderson
text: Pizza hut always good,  thanks

name: Brian Thompson
text: The stuffed crust is like soggy string cheese with no flavor. However, the rest of their pizza is well made. I especially love the crispy thin crust and the way they apply the perfect amount of sauce.

name: Rheeci Fair
text: Order came earlier than they said. Food was hot and delicious

name: Jessica Davis Bocanegra

text: Amazing Pizza end of story.,.hmmmm...hmmmm...GOODüòÅ

text: Was very clean and the food was delicious. Completely satisfied!

text: Waited almost 2 hours for a pizza that they didnt even try to deliver

name: Marrleskitteh
text: So nice even though I was there so late <3

name: Timothy Chan
text: We had a pizza with half cheese and half pepperoni.  The pizza was excellent in not only taste but was served piping hot.  Packets of hot chili flakes were also included.  Xavier's thoughtfulness made this unexpected visit simply wonderful!

name: BRENDA PORTELA
text: Pizza served hot but pretty tastless

name: Donna Kennedy
text: Need to bring back the salad pizza buffet

name: Braidi Warren
text: Super yummy pizza

name: Noble Hiser
text: My favorite pizza hands down

name: John Hastings
text: Pepperoni rolls need I say more? I don't think so!

name: Love and War
text: They refuse to deliver unless you spend almost $15 on food. Never mind my total was $17 with the outrageous delivery fee. BTW, for those of you who don't know, Pizza hut keeps every bit of that delivery fee. This place is a bad joke that should have been boo'd off stage.

name: THE Hammer
text: Where is the Buffet? üëé not here.

name: Melvin Henderson
text: Very good service im a truck driver that got stuck over the weekend . they deliervered my order . ive only had one other p-h do this for me and both was happy to do it for me. Thanks guys your the best.
